en.program: Reward Program managed by Cardstack Foundation

claim.retro_airdrop: Earned {amount} {token} averaged over time period for payments within {start_snapshot_block} and {end_snapshot_block}
claim.staking: Earned {amount} {token} for staking CARD monthly in your L2 depot between blocks {from_block} and {to_block}, {rollover_amount} tokens rolled over from unclaimed previous cycles
claim.profile_creation: Earned {amount} {token} for creating first profile by block {from_block}
